name: Papa Dance
description:
Papa Dance is a trivia quiz game about the Polish pop band Papa Dance. It was originally distributed as part of the band's vinyl record "Poni?ej Krytyki", to be recorded by the listener on cassette tape and then loaded into ZX Spectrum.

The game consists of questions asked to the player, to which they have to type in an answer. The answers are case sensitive. Each correct answer gives one point.

releases.comments: As tracks on the vinyl record "Poni?ej Krytyki"

shot.caption: This guy is one of the band members
Good answer. The counter increases by one point
